evidence.text: Plaintiffs respectfully ask this Court to order the Legislature to abide by a concrete timeline that will allow sufficient time for public notice, input, and the resolution of any litigation, and result in finalized, legally compliant maps well in advance of critical deadlines, including the March 30, 2022 candidate declaration deadline.
evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief, Three Judge Panel Requested
